name: Rainbow Web 3
summary:
In the past, you defeated the wicked spider and saved the End of the Rainbow. But trouble has returned and a shroud of evil has settled over the kingdom! Will you lift the veil of darkness and rescue the realm?

Swap colored beads on a spider's web to create matching chains and release letters to spell magical words. Each match you make will charge your mighty hammer with a bit of rainbow dust. When your hammer is ready, it can smash any bead, allowing you to spell the words you need more quickly! Between levels, you can use your magic to release cursed objects and restore the town! Rainbow Web 3 can provide hours of relaxing match-three challenges and captivating casual fun!
